SEARCH
Package io.brane.rpc

Interface WalletClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultWalletClient
public interface WalletClient
Client for submitting transactions to the blockchain with automatic gas estimation and nonce management.

This interface extends blockchain read operations with write capabilities (sending transactions). It automatically handles transaction preparation including:

  • Gas estimation via eth_estimateGas
  • Nonce fetching via eth_getTransactionCount
  • Gas price/fee calculation for both legacy and EIP-1559 transactions
  • Transaction signing
  • Transaction submission via eth_sendRawTransaction

Transaction Lifecycle:

  1. Create a TransactionRequest with at minimum a from address
  2. Call sendTransaction(io.brane.core.model.TransactionRequest) to submit → returns transaction hash immediately
  3. Optionally call sendTransactionAndWait(io.brane.core.model.TransactionRequest, long, long) to submit and wait for confirmation

Usage Example: 


 WalletClient client = BraneWalletClient.forChain(ChainProfiles.MAINNET)
         .withPrivateKey("0x...")
         .build();
 
 // Simple transfer
 TransactionRequest transfer = new TransactionRequest(
         myAddress, // from
         recipientAddress, // to
         Wei.fromEther("0.1"), // value
         null, null, null, // gas fields (auto-filled)
         null, null, // nonce, data (auto-filled)
         true, // EIP-1559
         null // access list
 );
 
 // Send and wait for confirmation
 TransactionReceipt receipt = client.sendTransactionAndWait(
         transfer,
         60_000, // timeout: 60 seconds
         1_000 // poll every 1 second
 );
 
 if (receipt.status()) {
     System.out.println("✓ Transaction confirmed in block " + receipt.blockNumber());
 }

  • Method Details

    • sendTransaction

      Hash sendTransaction(TransactionRequest request)
      Submits a transaction to the blockchain and returns immediately.

      This method:

      1. Fills in missing gas/nonce fields if null in the request
      2. Signs the transaction using the configured signer
      3. Broadcasts via eth_sendRawTransaction
      4. Returns the transaction hash without waiting for confirmation

      Note: The transaction is submitted but NOT confirmed. Use sendTransactionAndWait(io.brane.core.model.TransactionRequest, long, long) if you need to wait for confirmation.

      Parameters:
      request - the transaction request with at minimum a from address; all other fields are optional and will be auto-filled
      Returns:
      the transaction hash of the submitted transaction
      Throws:
      RpcException - if the RPC call fails (network error, insufficient funds, etc.)
      ChainMismatchException - if the configured chain ID doesn't match the node

    • sendTransactionAndWait

      TransactionReceipt sendTransactionAndWait(TransactionRequest request, long timeoutMillis, long pollIntervalMillis)
      Submits a transaction and waits for it to be confirmed in a block.

      This method combines sendTransaction(io.brane.core.model.TransactionRequest) with polling for the receipt. It will:

      1. Submit the transaction (same as sendTransaction(io.brane.core.model.TransactionRequest))
      2. Poll eth_getTransactionReceipt at the specified interval
      3. Return the receipt once the transaction is included in a block
      4. Throw an exception if timeout is reached or transaction reverts

      Revert Detection: If the transaction is included but reverts (status = false), this method will decode the revert reason and throw a RevertException with details.

      Parameters:
      request - the transaction request
      timeoutMillis - maximum time to wait for confirmation, in milliseconds
      pollIntervalMillis - how often to poll for the receipt, in milliseconds
      Returns:
      the transaction receipt once confirmed
      Throws:
      RpcException - if the RPC call fails
      RevertException - if the transaction reverts
      ChainMismatchException - if the configured chain ID doesn't match
      RuntimeException - if the timeout is exceeded before confirmation
